a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
if a <= b:
    print(0)
else:
    print(c - (a - b)) 

# a = bottles 1, b = bottles 2
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c < a:
    print(a - b - c)
else:
    print(0)

# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2, c = bottle 3
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a)
else:
    print(0)


# a = bottles 1, b = bottles 2, c = bottles 3
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a)
else:
    print(0)

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(max(0, c - (a - b)))


# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2, c = bottle 3, d = bottle 4
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c + d > a:
    print(b + c + d - a)
else:
    print(0)

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(c - (a - b)) 
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
print(c - (a - b))
